decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1803 PA00, 1803 PA01, 1803 PA02, 1803 PA03, 1803 PA04, 1803 EX01, 1803 EX02, 1803 EX04 and Design and Access Statement [received 11 October 2018] and 1803 EX03(A) [received on 10/12/2018]) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in th south-eastern side wall of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The cumulative measured or calculated rating level of noise emitted from the air conditioning condenser unit hereby approved shall be 10dB(A) below the existing background noise level, at all times that it operates. The measured or calculated noise levels shall be determined at the boundary of the nearest second floor noise sensitive premises or 1 meter from the facade of the nearest noise sensitive premises, and in accordance to the latest British Standard 4142. An alternative position for assessment /measurement may be used to allow ease of access; however, this must be shown on a map and noise propagation calculations detailed to show how the design criteria is achieved.
description: Erection of a second floor front extension with a retractable electronic awning, and installation of a roof window and a window to the rear of the house.
